## Basic Download Button

Download a CSV file:

{{< downloadthis data.csv >}}

## Custom Filename

Download with a custom filename:

{{< downloadthis data.csv dname=my-dataset >}}

## Custom Label

{{< downloadthis data.csv label="Get the Data" >}}

## Custom Icon

Using a different Bootstrap icon:

{{< downloadthis data.csv icon=file-earmark-arrow-down >}}

Primary style:

{{< downloadthis data.csv type=primary >}}

{{< downloadthis data.csv type=success >}}

Warning style:

{{< downloadthis data.csv type=warning >}}

Danger style:

{{< downloadthis data.csv dname=sample-data label="Download Sample" type=primary icon=cloud-download >}}

## With Custom Class and ID

{{< downloadthis data.csv class=my-download-btn id=main-download >}}

## Try Autocomplete

1. Type `{{< downloadthis ` to see file suggestions from the current directory
2. Type `{{< downloadthis data/` to browse into subdirectories
3. After selecting a file, press space to see attribute suggestions
4. Type `dn` to filter to `dname`
5. After `type=`, see available button style options
6. Attributes show defaults and descriptions in the completion popup
